name: Famicom Mini: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen
summary: Famicom Mini: Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen is the Game Boy Advance port of the Famicom game 2nd Super Robot Wars (Dai-2-ji Super Robot Taisen). It was released as a bonus for people who purchased the Nintendo GameCube game Super Robot Wars Hyper Robot Warriors GC-CV. Only 2000 copies were printed.
